name: Seven Winters
description:
You got lost in snow storm after learning you inherited a house from your dad but instead of your house, you find a mansion with a beautiful girl living inside. Not knowing what would happen you spent time with her waiting storm to end.
Playtime : 15~30 minutes

3 Endings

This is my first jam and first visual novel with complexity. I hope you enjoy it.

Credits :

Story/Art/Code by Den
Character Design /Proof Read/Editing by ChanPoTei
Co-writer/Proof Read by Cem Atalay

Seven Winters is a short visual novel created for the Winter Visual Novel Jam 2022.
